headline: Buy These 5 Old Economy Stocks With Double-Digit Upside for Near Term
summary: We recommend investing in five old economy stocks with a favorable Zacks Rank for short-term double-digit upside potential. These are: PCG, FIX, DXPE, PGR, GE.

headline: PG&E foresees ‘bright future’ with lower prices, higher demand
summary: CEO Patti Poppe said the company expects new legislation to shore up California's wildfire insurance program this year.

raw.headline: PG&E foresees ‘bright future’ with lower prices, higher demand
